name: clean-architecture-todo-list-app
description: This project is intended to show the power of scale by using clean architecture in a project, even with an application with "simple" functionality such as a ToDo List.

scripts.dev: npm run env -- ts-node --transpile-only -r ts-path-mapping/register src/index.ts
scripts.pretest: npm run env -- prisma migrate reset --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma --skip-seed
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run env -- prisma generate --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run env -- prisma migrate dev --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma --name
scripts.prisma:migrate:run: npm run env -- prisma migrate dev --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma --skip-seed
scripts.prisma:reset: npm run env -- prisma migrate reset --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma --skip-seed
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run env -- prisma studio --schema src/infrastructure/prisma/schema.prisma
